doc.field: GROUP [FPL] UNIT SELLS BONDS AT 8.951 PCT

- FPL Group Capital Inc, a unit of FPL Group Inc, is raising 150 mln dlrs through an offering of debentures due 2017 yielding 8.951 pct, said lead manager Salomon Brothers Inc. The debentures have an 8-7/8 pct coupon and were priced at 99.20 to yield 135 basis points over the off-the-run 9-1/4 pct Treasury bonds of 2016. Non-refundable for five years, the issue is rated A-2 by Moody's and A-plus by Standard and Poor's. Goldman Sachs co-managed the deal.
